thread.title: Kahi Shows Off Unbelievable Figure Just 5 Months After Childbirth
thread.title_full: Kahi Shows Off Unbelievable Figure Just 5 Months After Childbirth

author: kiddy_days
title: Kahi Shows Off Unbelievable Figure Just 5 Months After Childbirth
text:
Shares 545 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Kahi revealed her amazing figure just five months after giving birth to her first child, Noah. 
On March 20, she posted a short video of her perfectly toned abs on her Instagram with the caption, “In the middle of a fitness magazine shoot.” She added, “Let’s exercise together.”   A post shared by 가희. Kahi Jiyoung Park (@kahi_korea) on Mar 19, 2017 at 7:38pm PDT 
Kahi relayed the secrets to her unreal post-childbirth body, saying, “I was able to go to the gym thanks to my mom’s help, but I want to tell you that’s it’s more important to exercise at home. Even if you can’t go out, watch what you eat and train at home like me.” 
Meanwhile, Kahi got married to a businessman last March and gave birth to her son Noah last year in October.
